summary: This mod allows to your character to change into any race, including custom ones, and preserve your skills and perks.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2155/][color=#4b83f1][u]ShowRaceMenu Alternative[/u] is now available for Skyrim Special Edition![/color][/url][/size]

[img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/banner.png[/img][/center]
[b]Author :[/b] Seb263
[b]Current Version :[/b] 3.0.0 ([i]02/01/2014[/i])
[b][color=#00ff00]If you like this mod, don't forget to support it![/color][/b]

[center][img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/title-left.png[/img][img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/introduction.png[/img][img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/title-right.png[/img]

Here is version 3.0 of the [u]ShowRaceMenu Alternative[/u] mod.

Thanks to this new version, [u]ShowRaceMenu Alternative[/u] is not only a debug function, it is also [b]integrated into the game without breaking immersion[/b].
[b]A "lore" version[/b] allows you to customize and have race-changing scrolls added to the various mages in-game for purchase.

In addition, [b]the problems encountered in previous versions are history[/b] (i.e reverting back from Werewolf/Vampire lord).

Whatever your race may be, even if vampire's blood runs through your veins, [b]you can change into any race, including custom ones, and preserve your skills and perks[/b].

[img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/title-left.png[/img][img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/how-does-it-work.png[/img][img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/title-right.png[/img]

All you have to do is to [b]go in the spells menu (in the powers tab), use the "ShowRaceMenu Alternative" spell and follow the instructions[/b].

[color=#cc3333][b]Don't use directly the "ShowRaceMenu" command, it will not work.[/b][/color]

[img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/title-left.png[/img][img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/prerequisites.png[/img][img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/title-right.png[/img]

[b]If your character has any legendary skills, you will need to launch Skyrim with SKSE to preserve them.
SKSE is [u]NOT NECESSARY[/u] for every other function of the mod.[/b]

[img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/title-left.png[/img][img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/important-notes.png[/img][img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/title-right.png[/img]

[color=#cc3333][b]If you use the old version of [u]ShowRaceMenu Alternative[/u] (previously called "ShowRaceMenuFix.esp"), do not forget to uninstall it.[/b][/color]

[b]This mod does not change any Race, NPCs, quest, or anything else.
The original game (Vanilla) was completely preserved, there should therefore be no conflict with any other mod.[/b]

[img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/title-left.png[/img][img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/installation.png[/img][img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/title-right.png[/img][/center]
[b]Automatic Installation :[/b]
- It is recommended to use the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/modmanager/]Nexus Mod Manager[/url] to easily install the mod and keep it up to date.

[b]Manual Installation :[/b]
1. [b]Download the latest version of [u]ShowRaceMenu Alternative[/u].[/b]
2. Open the archive using [url=http://www.7-zip.org]7zip[/url] or [url=http://www.win-rar.com]Winrar[/url].
3. Put "[b]ShowRaceMenuAlternative.esp[/b]" and "[b]ShowRaceMenuAlternative.bsa[/b]" in the game folder.
(Default: C:Program FilesSteamSteamappscommonSkyrimData)
4. Launch the Skyrim launcher and click on [b]Data Files[/b].
5. Check the box next to "[b]ShowRaceMenuAlternative.esp[/b]".[center]

[img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/title-left.png[/img][img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/credits.png[/img][img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/title-right.png[/img][/center]
Thanks to [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?showuser=1709101]bbe[/url] for his translations of the mod description, as well as for testing this mod.
Thanks to [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?showuser=972816]Sagittarius22[/url] for testing this mod.
Music: Thanks to [url=http://www.jamendo.com/fr/artist/2740/celestial-aeon-project]Matti Paalanen[/url] for this wonderful copyright free music used in the mod.

[center][img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/title-left.png[/img][img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/legal-mentions.png[/img][img]http://seb263.fr/mods/showracemenu-alternative/nexus/images/title-right.png[/img][/center]
[b]This mod may not be published or modified without my permission.[/b]
author: Seb263

files.name: ShowRaceMenu Alternative - V-2-0-0
files.changelogHtml:
Allow to change your character\'s race by using a spell, and removes any possible bugs.
Adds a torch to your character in order to better see the changes made.
